title: Okereke
author: Okereke
content: The year 2022 ce with a lot of instability in the entire crypto market with some altcoins such as Solana losing their value by almost 70%. Even the worth of BTC and ETH also dropped drastically living many people confused and lost huge funds to this market instability (Bear market as it is called). As a new trader I would like to know from our experts, the altcoins with good potentials in this 2023.

Even the worth of BTC and ETH also dropped drastically living many people confused and lost huge funds to this market instability (Bear market as it is called). As a new trader I would like to know from our experts, the altcoins with good potentials in this 2023. You've just said the first one for the altcoins and that's Ethereum. You don't have to look that far in the market because everyone is aware that ETH is one of the most desired altcoin to have by most holders.It doesn't just have the potential but it's a market leader for altcoins. Although, the 2023 might another be a rough time to look at but ETH has just proven itself as one of the top altcoins that one should have, only if you like to have it thus, find some other coins.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: For 2023 I will continue with Ethereum, FUN token and CRO from Crypto.com as altcoins. Ethereum because, after bitcoin, it's the second option when we talk about cryptocurrencies. There isn't other altcoin with the same potential and reputation of ETH in the market. FUN because it has proved to be a stable altcoin which offer decent benefits through freebitco.in premium program, and CRO I stake the amount required by Crypto.com platform to have access to their debit card, which is useful and convenient when dealing with crypto and fiat in a daily basis.

comments.body: Quote from: Okereke on January 01, 2023, 04:06:05 PMThe year 2022 ce with a lot of instability in the entire crypto market with some altcoins such as Solana losing their value by almost 70%. Even the worth of BTC and ETH also dropped drastically living many people confused and lost huge funds to this market instability (Bear market as it is called). As a new trader I would like to know from our experts, the altcoins with good potentials in this 2023. Many complain about the state of the crypto market in 2022, they make various arguments about crypto. But most others are still eagerly awaiting the future of crypto. This is our energy so far even though the contents of the bag are running low. Of course there is still our big hope for the following years. As you wish for altcoins for 2023. All altcoins still have good hopes for the future. What you have to learn is how far the altcoin lasts. You should look at altcoins that have an effect on other altcoins. For example Ethereum, this is an altcoin that has an effect on other altcoins. If Ethereum dies, of course all the altcoins that have forked on it will die. Of course this is one of the altcoins that has future potential, because all investors will defend Ethereum, altcoins that fork on Ethereum will automatically survive. Likewise with BNB, or Polygon.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: The best coin I am still going to look out for this 2023 is still Bitcoin, the calendar just changed from 2022 to 2023 and that’s all the market is not determined by calendars. Don’t make that mistake or have that immature pressure to buy a coin hoping a new year would save it.If it must be Altcoin still do your own research and the risk becomes more on Altcoins that are new or have low market cap.

Some of the answers you will receive if you ask a question like "what project is good to buy now" or "what project will rise in the future", will probably not be neutral answers to your question but just shill-answers of people that want you to buy the token that they are also invested in so they can dump on you.As others in this thread already said, i think it could be a good move to buy some of the established projects now, because we are in a bear market. If you are buying now and are willing to hold a few years, then you should be able to make a nice profit.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I personally see 2023 as the year which will bring the demise of the Ethereum coin,the PoS one,the one we all knew until September 2022 as a great coin.Since moving to PoS they are offering nothing and they are also making it difficult for people who have staked their coins by extending the time they need their staked coins in order to be able to withdraw them,this does not sound well at all for Ethereum.Promising altcoins for me are,Raptoreum as a CPU coin with a great team of programmers behind it,it is in the lowest price right now but the team plans to add 2-3 programming languages like Java and Python for developers to build apps on it which I think it will add a lot of value to this coin.Then I believe this so far without any valid argument just my inner instinct tells me so,I believe in ETHW and ETHF the two so called chains that have self declared as the ones who will substitute ETH for good,so far they are far from it but they are in their infancy stage.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: I'm not a crypto expert but I know the history of coins that really have a good track record from the past to the present and ethereum is the answer. ethereum is one of the altcoins that has a good future after bitcoin and has been recognized by large investors. ethereum will always be the best choice after choosing bitcoin and you deserve to buy ethereum for the long term.some people here will definitely recommend ethereum more because they already know ethereum's journey from the lowest price to the ATH price last year.for me, there is no good altcoin other than ethereum. but my advice is still to do your own research before buying.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: I do not see an altcoin that can dominate in 2023 and bring significant developments, so I think it is unnecessary to take such a risk. There may also be periods before the bull season starts when all dominance flows to Bitcoin, and if all the money in the market is collected in Bitcoin, altcoins may once again disappoint. I am not planning to buy altcoins before Bitcoin has a bull run, as I do not think there is any need to rush into it.
